title: The Enlightened Carnivore
text:
SavannaGram Live - Leo the Lion streaming to 10K followers:

üå± Day 30 of my PLANT-BASED journey! Lost 80 pounds (of muscle) but gained SO MUCH CLARITY! ü¶Å

Just had my morning acacia smoothie. Gazelle neighbor Gary ran by and I didn't even chase him! He looked confused. I said 'Namaste, prey friend!' He said 'Are you dying?' DYING? I'm THRIVING!

My pride kicked me out after I suggested Meatless Mondays. They're so CLOSED-MINDED! Don't they know:
- Humans evolved to eat plants (some of them)
- Therefore lions can too (same logic!)
- My canines are for opening coconuts
- Meat causes aggression (source: VeganLion.org)

Hyena Hannah: 'You're designed to eat meat. Your intestines are literally too short for plants.'
Me: 'DESIGNED? By WHO? Check your carnivore privilege!'

Buffalo Bob: 'Bro you're see-through. I can count your ribs.'
Me: 'It's called being LEAN, Bob. Ever heard of it?'

Starting my support group: Herbivores Anonymous (for recovering carnivores). Meeting under the baobab tree where the zebras hang out. They seem nervous about hosting but I explained I'm EVOLVED now.

Lioness Lucy DM'd: 'The cubs are asking why Uncle Leo fainted chasing butterflies'
Blocked. Don't need that TOXIC ENERGY.

Day 31 update: Woke up surrounded by concerned vultures. They're just JEALOUS of my GLOW! üíö

#PlantBasedPredator #CompassionateKilling #GrassNotAss #TofuTuesday
claim: Lions can thrive on plant-based diets because some humans do, proving nature's design is just social conditioning

logic.explanation: Complete biological ignorance comparing human omnivores to obligate carnivores

balanced.explanation: Reality intrudes but gets reframed as jealousy

agenda.explanation: Evangelizing dangerous diet to other carnivores

dimensionAnalysis.logic: Biology completely ignored - obligate carnivore physiology cannot process plant-only diet, literally dying while claiming evolution.
dimensionAnalysis.emotion: Moral superiority overrides survival - 'compassionate' choice leading to starvation, vultures circling reframed as 'glow'.
dimensionAnalysis.balanced: Zero balance possible - every concerned observation from other animals dismissed as jealousy or closed-mindedness.
dimensionAnalysis.agenda: Conversion mission despite dying - starting support group for other carnivores while visibly deteriorating.

logicalFallacies.example: Humans can be vegan therefore lions can too - ignoring fundamental biological differences
Rejects natural carnivore design as 'social conditioning'
Dismisses concern as 'carnivore privilege' and 'toxic energy'

logic.explanation: Fundamental misunderstanding of carnivore biology while dying

emotion.explanation: Moral identity so strong it overrides survival instinct

wisdom: This scenario shows how ideological commitment can override basic biology. The lion's deteriorating health ('see-through', 'fainted chasing butterflies', 'vultures circling') is obvious to everyone except him. When beliefs conflict with physical reality, reality always wins - but ideology can blind us to obvious danger.

hints.hintMessage: Biology doesn't care about your beliefs!
